This version dont have 100 maps. When I completed the 7th level, the game is done. How do i do to get the 100 levels?
Hi. I've actually downloaded the demo version before. My wife and I both love playing this game. Used to love playing it on the arcade games back in about 1991. Thanks very much for this posting.

Oh, one more thing. ApostelofHim, please ensure you register the game in order to go beyond level 7. I'm guessing you're playing the unregistered version. The download comes with a torrent key. Load the game and click on register. There's an option to load the reg key from a txt file. The txt file is in the folder you downloaded, not the installation folder. Hope that helps.
